meanings.definition: A person who sets up or adjusts pins in a bowling alley.
meanings.sent1: The pinspotters at the bowling alley make sure the pins are in the right place.
meanings.sent2: The skilled pinspotters quickly arrange the pins for the next game.
meanings.sent3: The pinspotters decided to have a race to see who could set up the pins the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was like a pinspotter in the way she carefully arranged her thoughts before speaking.
meanings.sent5: The pinspotters' job is crucial to the smooth running of the bowling alley.

meanings.definition: A machine that automatically sets up pins in a bowling alley.
meanings.sent1: The new pinspotters in the bowling alley are very efficient at their job.
meanings.sent2: The maintenance team fixed the pinspotters to ensure they work perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The pinspotters had a mind of their own and started setting up pins randomly.
meanings.sent4: The pinspotters hummed softly as they arranged the pins, almost like a choir.
meanings.sent5: The futuristic design of the pinspotters amazed the bowlers at the alley.
